reviews.review:
Отзывы всё равно никто не читает, поэтому напишу рецепт борща:
Мясо (мякоть говядины) - 250 г
Свёкла (среднего размера) - 1 шт.
Капуста белокочанная - 150-180 г
Картофель - 200 г
Морковь - 1 шт.
Лук репчатый (небольшого размера) - 2 шт.
Чеснок - 1-2 зубчика
Томатная паста - 1,5 ст. ложки
Уксус 6% - 1 ч. ложка
Масло растительное - 30-40 г
Лавровый лист - 1 шт.
Соль - по вкусу
Перец чёрный молотый - по вкусу
Вода - 2,5 л
Сметана (для подачи) - по вкусу
Укроп свежий (для подачи) - по вкусу
經典 還可以雙人合作
I liked how the story arc is and how enemies can become your friends.

One of the greatest stories I have ever played through, and incredibly well designed. From the art to the motion fx, to the character development and plot progression, I think Portal 2 is a masterpiece. Especially given that it was released 10 years ago today. Incredible.
This is the best game that I have ever played! I recommend it to anyone!

The game is simple yet a little hard (I had to get some help while playing), the story line was really enjoyable and the plot was unexpected. I recommend this game for many people how enjoyed the first game Portal game  .

My favorite game of all time. amazing story with rich history and implications. A great spin off of the half life universe with great characters and amazing dialogue that never fails to entertain.
Portal 2 is still better than a lot of games that came out in 2021
Really fun game, love the 2 player multiplayer and also the new mechanics in the story mode aswell

Malheureusement pas beaucoup de références au premier (j'aime le fan service) mais le point positifs c'est qu'on peu y jouer et comprendre le scénario sans avoir joué au premier. Il y a de nouvelles mécaniques, et un temps de jeu bien plus long.
